summary: Vivek Ramaswamy - Vivek Ramaswamy is a prominent American entrepreneur, author, and biotech investor known for his impactful work in the healthcare and pharmaceutical industries. As the founder and CEO of Roivant Sciences, he has made significant contributions to the development of innovative treatments for various diseases. Ramaswamy is also recognized for his thought-provoking perspectives on capitalism, innovation, and the role of corporations in society. He also ran a campaign to be president claiming to support the crypto world from all the sides he can.
